content: crochet ridged fingerless gloves - keep your hands warm and leave your fingers free for texting with this pair of lovely fingerless gloves the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 6 5 x 4 inches level intermediate copyright ©2023 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-ridged-fingerless-gloves/
